attributes.contentHtml:
Innocent the validity of my statement is clear, the source of copying is ZoidCloud's Privacy Policy. Also, you are still dodging evidence. Let me just explain what you are doing

First, you appeared in my DMs and I asked identify yourself, and your response was childish.

Second, you sent a image saying that Luxxy got DMCA'd and eventually, you deleted it. But luckily I have a screenshot, because of this you may have deleted more messages.

The message deletion:

The image deleted:

Third, you tried to put a robot's name over Luxxy to cover his stealing. Also, how is H3NRY?

Fourth, deleted a post on drama.gg, more suspicious.

Fifth, childish actions, making a FAQ saying Mastermined to shut his mouth and posting a copied source of Privacy Policy from ZoidCloud.

Also, the final, not getting Luxxy to talk here. Seems he is afraid of me and he accepts that.

attributes.title: Luxxy hosting ( free hosting ) - luxxy stealer

attributes.contentHtml:
Mastermined_ Damn. You exposed me. AM I dodging evidence? LOOK AT THE FUCKING PRIVACY POLICIES & THE TEMPLATE MAKER. I HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR RAMBLES. It is time that I took my matters into my own hands. But yeah, he does look at the drama. I deleted the post to not drag my good friend into the convo. Thank you for making me realize these stuff. H3NRy is fine. TO be serious. H3nry has a username & ID. 861546992478846996, H3NRY#3384.

Evidence that he made the policy.

Now. This isn't luxxy. This is someone else, but I asked this person to make the pp.
Mastermined_ I made that shut up statement because you were getting on my Fing neurons.

Mastermined_ Have I had enough. After completing a full analysis on both PP's, I have come to a conclusion. They both use the same pp generator. Yours, however, removed the "Our
Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Free Privacy Policy Generator.
"

Have a look.
https://www.privacypolicygenerator.info/


Next. I add the necessary details.

Then. I add the country & such

Then. It generates.

You can't tell me the similarities between both Privacy Policies, the generated one & the one I made.

https://www.privacypolicygenerator.info/live.php?token=ZDTxzqFWKsr0cQZuXA2HNMEsfpvKmmIu

https://zoidcloud.com/pp.html

This is the most incriminating evidence, as they have the SAME CODE & FONT.

Have a direct look & NOTICE.

Then I repeat the same process for Luxxy Hosting's

Avaliable at: https://www.privacypolicygenerator.info/live.php?token=9hAby15HD96biWN5JNpFbnkxq2yxXiub


Notice that I put luxxy.tech instead of panel.luxxy.host

Mastermined_

To answer 1. Yes, I did do that. Just to see if you could Identify me.

I admit that I am part childish.
Mastermined_ also this isnâ€™t answered, man you are not my level even to talk.
